name: NOSnews
0:
”Alexa ask N. O. S. the latest news”
”Alexa ask N. O. S. the morning update”
”Alexa open N. O. S.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. o. s.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The NOS will bring you the most important news of the day from the Netherlands whenever you want.

We offer you two options, both in Dutch:

1. Ask for the latest news. In less than 3 minutes you will be up to date of the most important news at the moment. The latest news is updated every hour.
2. Ask for the morning update. Every working day around 07:00 we have a morning update with the news that you might have missed during the night and what you can expect in the news today.

You can ask for both options directly: Ask N. O. S. for the latest news. Or: Ask N. O. S. for the morning update


Altijd Overal NOS.

Nederlands nieuws. NOS Journaal.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
